text: in China not that long ago most people
lived in the countryside
looking after their animals and growing
their own food
life was hard
and people were poor
and then everything started to change
factories sprang up to make things that
people all over the world wanted to buy
and suddenly millions of people were on
the move from the countryside to huge
new cities where they could get money by
working in the factories but when the
adults moved away they were not allowed
to detect their children with them
millions of them were left behind in the
countryside
they are now known as the left-behind
children
this is the story of one of them what a
console well yeah how you are genius my
name is Tang new one and I'm 11 years
old I live here with my grandmother my
brother and two cousins my parents don't
live here they work in another city
called Chengdu they both work in
factories making clothes also my parents
don't earn much and they don't get to
spend much time with us but thanks to
the hard work we are not down and out
when mom and dad come back to visit
I run to meet them I run a very long way
because I can't wait to be close to them
what I love most is to go fishing with
them on my own I can only catch one or
two fish straight at most but when mum
and dad are here we catch lots of fish
during Chinese New Year mum and dad
visits for longer we set off fireworks
to celebrate they start out small with
not much light but then they fly high
into the sky and explode suddenly they
are bright and colourful and very
beautiful it's not easy for mum and dad
to come back to visit us
they can only stay for a few days first
before they have to leave again I wish
they could keep me with them I don't
want to be separated from them so that I
know is hard for mum and dad to earn
money I don't want to cause trouble for
them but I miss them so much it's very
painful but I can't do anything about it
because I don't want to father that if I
call them I will disturb them I can't do
anything but wait so generous and really
want them to come back
very blue ha yeah
when I grow up I won't leave here this
is my home I want to do something back
I'd like to be a boss run the factory
and I'll take my kiss to my workplace so
we can stay together
